titles.title: He's Setting Me Free, With The Holy Ghost Power

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's setting me free, with the Holy Ghost power.
He's setting me free, this very hour.
He's flooding my soul.
He's making me whole.
He's setting me free, free, free,
With the Holy Ghost power.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's giving me life with the Holy Ghost power, etc...
He's killing my flesh with the Holy Ghost power, etc...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Me libra a mi, el poder del Se√±or.
Me libra a mi, de todo temor.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Libera mi alma, mi espiritu calma.
